g.text: 根据主界面的状态询问应当显示哪个作业
返回应当显示的作业内容

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 88px; height: 1px; padding-top: 145px; margin-left: 101px;

a.text: Viewer does not support full SVG 1.1
